name: Alley Roller Splash
description:
Overview

  • Based upon the three well known games of Alley Roller, Dunk Tank and Darts.
  • These three games have been mixed together to become Alley Roller Splash.
  • Use the turret to launch balls at the target.
  • If you reach the max score, your friend will be in for a splash..

Controls

  • Player 1
    • Movement: W A S D
    • Launch: Space
  • Player 2
    • Movement: Up Down Left Right
    • Launch: Return
